snippet: Private equity firms may be looking to Advance Auto Parts for the next big leveraged buyout -- at least, by the standards of the post-financial-crisis era.
abstract: Private equity firms may be looking to Advance Auto Parts for the next big leveraged buyout -- at least, by the standards of the post-financial-crisis era.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Advance Auto Parts Said to Consider a Sale
